mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_ID , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.EVA_CD , A.SCORE_FIN , TO_CHAR(A.EVA_START_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS EVA_START_DT , TO_CHAR(A.EVA_END_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS EVA_END_DT , A.DEL_YN , A.FRST_RGSR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , A.LAST_CHNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNF_DTL_DTTM , B.CODE_KR AS EVA_CD_NM FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT A LEFT JOIN SCH_INCU.CODE B ON A.EVA_CD = B.CODE_VAL WHERE 1=1 AND A.EVA_CD NOT IN ('00') AND B.CODE_NAME = 'EVALUATION' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.PROJECT_ID , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.EVA_CD , (SELECT CODE_KR FROM SCH_INCU.CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_NAME = 'EVALUATION' AND A.EVA_CD = CODE_VAL) AS EVA_CD_NM , A.SCORE_FIN , TO_CHAR(A.EVA_START_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS EVA_START_DT , TO_CHAR(A.EVA_END_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS EVA_END_DT , A.DEL_YN , A.FRST_RGSR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FRST_RGSR_DTL_DTTM , A.LAST_CHNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_CHNG_DTL_DTTM , B.GROUP_ID , B.PROJECT_DETAIL , B.URL , C.GROUP_ID , C.GROUP_CD , (SELECT CODE_KR FROM SCH_INCU.CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_NAME = 'GROUP' AND C.GROUP_CD = CODE_VAL) AS GROUP_CD_NM FROM SCH_INCU.PROJECT A , SCH_INCU.PROJECT_DETAIL B , SCH_INCU.GROUP C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROJECT_ID = B.PROJECT_ID AND A.PROJECT_ID = C.PROJECT_ID
AND A.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
